# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(Label_plot)

ADD_PLOT_CODE_GEN_TARGETS(Label)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
LabelPluginInfo.C
LabelCommonPluginInfo.C
LabelAttributes.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES
LabelPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBG_SOURCES
LabelGUIPluginInfo.C
QvisLabelPlotWindow.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
)

SET(LIBV_SOURCES
LabelViewerEnginePluginInfo.C
LabelViewerPluginInfo.C
avtLabelPlot.C
avtLabelFilter.C
avtLabelSubsetsFilter.C
avtLabelMapper.C
vtkLabelMapperBase.C
vtkLabelMapper.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
LabelViewerEnginePluginInfo.C
LabelEnginePluginInfo.C
avtLabelPlot.C
avtLabelFilter.C
avtLabelSubsetsFilter.C
avtLabelMapper.C
vtkLabelMapperBase.C
vtkLabelMapper.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
)


INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${VISIT_PLOT_INCLUDES}
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Plotter/vtk
)

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} )

ADD_LIBRARY(ILabelPlot ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(ILabelPlot visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ILabelPlot)

IF(NOT VISIT_SERVER_COMPONENTS_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(GLabelPlot ${LIBG_SOURCES})
    set_target_properties(GLabelPlot PROPERTIES AUTOMOC ON)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(GLabelPlot visitcommon gui )

    ADD_LIBRARY(VLabelPlot ${LIBV_SOURCES})
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(VLabelPlot VIEWER)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(VLabelPlot visitcommon viewer )

    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} GLabelPlot VLabelPlot)

    IF(VISIT_PYTHON_SCRIPTING)
        SET(LIBS_SOURCES
            LabelScriptingPluginInfo.C
            PyLabelAttributes.C
            ${COMMON_SOURCES}
        )
        ADD_LIBRARY(SLabelPlot ${LIBS_SOURCES})
        IF(WIN32)
            # This prevents python from #defining snprintf as _snprintf
            SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(SLabelPlot PROPERTIES COMPILE_DEFINITIONS HAVE_SNPRINTF)
        ENDIF()
        TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(SLabelPlot visitcommon visitpy ${PYTHON_LIBRARY})
        SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} SLabelPlot)
    ENDIF(VISIT_PYTHON_SCRIPTING)

    IF(VISIT_JAVA)
        FILE(COPY LabelAttributes.java DESTINATION ${JavaClient_BINARY_DIR}/src/plots)
        ADD_CUSTOM_TARGET(JavaLabel ALL ${Java_JAVAC_EXECUTABLE} ${VISIT_Java_FLAGS} -d ${JavaClient_BINARY_DIR} -classpath ${JavaClient_BINARY_DIR} -sourcepath ${JavaClient_BINARY_DIR} LabelAttributes.java
            DEPENDS JavaClient
            WORKING_DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})
    ENDIF(VISIT_JAVA)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_SERVER_COMPONENTS_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(ELabelPlot_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(ELabelPlot_ser visitcommon avtpipeline_ser avtplotter_ser )
ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(ELabelPlot_ser ENGINE)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} ELabelPlot_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(ELabelPlot_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(ELabelPlot_par visitcommon avtpipeline_par avtplotter_par )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(ELabelPlot_par ENGINE)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} ELabelPlot_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_PLOT_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_OUTPUT_DIR(plots ${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_FOLDER(plots Label ${INSTALLTARGETS})
